1406440.name: Fantasy Grounds - Here be Kobolds Again!
1406440.description:
Here be Kobolds Again!

This is a follow-up pack with 35 Kobold tokens wielding a variety of weapons and with different scale colors.

This product includes:
  • Kobold_Axe_Black
  • Kobold_Axe_Blue
  • Kobold_Axe_Green
  • Kobold_Axe_Red
  • Kobold_Axe_White
  • Kobold_Club_Black
  • Kobold_Club_Blue
  • Kobold_Club_Green
  • Kobold_Club_Red
  • Kobold_Club_White
  • Kobold_Crossbow_Black
  • Kobold_Crossbow_Blue
  • Kobold_Crossbow_Green
  • Kobold_Crossbow_Red
  • Kobold_Crossbow_White
  • Kobold_Javelin_Black
  • Kobold_Javelin_Blue
  • Kobold_Javelin_Green
  • Kobold_Javelin_Red
  • Kobold_Javelin_White
  • Kobold_Sling_Black
  • Kobold_Sling_Blue
  • Kobold_Sling_Green
  • Kobold_Sling_Red
  • Kobold_Sling_White
  • Kobold_Spear_Black
  • Kobold_Spear_Blue
  • Kobold_Spear_Green
  • Kobold_Spear_Red
  • Kobold_Spear_White
  • Kobold_Sword_Black
  • Kobold_Sword_Blue
  • Kobold_Sword_Green
  • Kobold_Sword_Red
  • Kobold_Sword_White
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
J Baptista
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset. Compatible with Fantasy Grounds Unity
